Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Class BleService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.internal.P_NativeGattObject<BluetoothGattService>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UsesCustomNull, UsesInstanceId
    public final class BleService
extends P_NativeGattObject<BluetoothGattService>
implements UsesInstanceId
    Wrapper class which holds an instance of BluetoothGattService. You should always check P_NativeGattObject.isNull() before doing anything with the BluetoothGattService returned from getService().
